name: Tiny Room - room escape game
description:
A simple escape game that’s as easy to play as it is fun.

Goal:
- Unlock the puzzles and riddles to escape the room to safety.

How to play:
- Tap to zoom in or explore areas of interest.
- Tap the arrow buttons to move left and right around the room.
- Tap items in the inventory box on the bottom of the screen to select them.
